name: @shannqa/dropdown-menu
description: Package adding a simple dropdown menu. The menu is adjusted to mobile view as well.

scripts.deploy-gh: git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: git push origin main && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy-gh-init: git push origin && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
